amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning Medicare payments to physicians and other health professionals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1115 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1115 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S8681, S8682-8683; text: CR S8682-8683) To express the sense of the Senate concerning Medicare payments to physicians and other health professionals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1115 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1115 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kyl.
